summary: TL* THE CONTACT OWNS A 2011 DODGE DURANGO.  THE CONTACT STATED THAT AT START UP AND ON OCCASIONS WHILE DRIVING, THE FORWARD COLLISION DETECTION SYSTEM BECAME INOPERABLE WITHOUT WARNING. THE TRACTION CONTROL WARNING LIGHT AND CRUISE CONTROL WARNING WAS ALSO ILLUMINATED. THE CONTACTED STATED THAT THE BRAKING SYSTEM OPERATED AS INTENDED. NEITHER THE DEALER NOR THE MANUFACTURER WAS CONTACTED OR INFORMED OF THE FAILURE. THE APPROXIMATE FAILURE MILEAGE WAS 130,000.
